[![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/logo-main-white.svg)![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/logo-main-white.svg)](/)


Need AI-accurate online fraud prevention in <1 second?

![check-symbol](/illustration/icon/check-symbol.svg)

Automated fraud detection system

![check-symbol](/illustration/icon/check-symbol.svg)

Chargeback guarantee

![check-symbol](/illustration/icon/check-symbol.svg)

No long-term contracts

[Contact us for a free demo](/contact/)

![](/illustration/hero.svg)

Preventing chargeback fraud for enterprise clients for more than a decade

![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/hotels_logo2.png)![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/pcrichard_logo2.svg)![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/cvs_logo2.png)![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/ashford_logo2.svg)![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/bbb_logo2.svg)

  * ![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/cvs_logo2.png)

  * ![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/pcrichard_logo2.svg)![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/ashford_logo2.svg)

  * ![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/hotels_logo2.png)![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/bbb_logo2.svg)

  * ![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/cvs_logo2.png)

  * ![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/pcrichard_logo2.svg)![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/ashford_logo2.svg)




What we do

![](/illustration/padlock.svg)

![](/illustration/oval/smallGreenCircle.svg)

### Chargeback protection

Chargebacks are bleeding your business dry. What if you could predict a future chargeback before even accepting the order? **What if it was all taken care of automatically in less than a second?** Giving you lower staff costs and more approved transactions, FraudFix is like an invincible security guard for your online storefront.

![](/illustration/target.svg)

![](/illustration/oval/smallPurpleCircle.svg)

### Highest approval rates

Stop choosing between declining good orders and preventing fraud. FraudFix can help you **automate your approvals by as much as 98.5%** , maximizing profits without the cost of fraud.

![](/illustration/fingerprint.svg)

![](/illustration/oval/smallYellowCircle.svg)

### Fastest approval

Your customers aren't going to wait around while their orders get checked. **Don't settle for less than a one second fraud check. Guaranteed.**

![](/illustration/shield.svg)

![](/illustration/oval/smallPurpleCircle.svg)

### Chargeback prevention guarantee

**No protection; no payment.** Any chargebacks you experience are deducted from our fee with our optional chargeback guarantee.

![](/illustration/padlock.svg)

![](/illustration/oval/smallGreenCircle.svg)

### Chargeback protection

Chargebacks are bleeding your business dry. What if you could predict a future chargeback before even accepting the order? **What if it was all taken care of automatically in less than a second?** Giving you lower staff costs and more approved transactions, FraudFix is like an invincible security guard for your online storefront.

![](/illustration/oval/smallPurpleCircle.svg)

### Highest approval rates

Stop choosing between declining good orders and preventing fraud. FraudFix can help you **automate your approvals by as much as 98.5%** , maximizing profits without the cost of fraud.

![](/illustration/target.svg)

![](/illustration/fingerprint.svg)

![](/illustration/oval/smallYellowCircle.svg)

### Fastest approval

Your customers aren't going to wait around while their orders get checked. **Don't settle for less than a one second fraud check. Guaranteed.**

![](/illustration/oval/smallPurpleCircle.svg)

### Chargeback prevention guarantee

**No protection; no payment.** Any chargebacks you experience are deducted from our fee with our optional chargeback guarantee.

![](/illustration/shield.svg)

### No more tedious,time-consuming, manual fraud checks.

![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/angry.svg)

##### Manual fraud checks

An order comes in at 4pm. Which employee is going to spend hours digging into the research to guess if the transaction is valid, risking losing a sale or facing a chargeback?

![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/stars.svg)

##### FraudFix AI-powered checks

We create and manage your customized algorithm at no extra cost. Lower staff costs + higher approval rates = more revenue. How’s that for a win-win?

![](/illustration/dashboard/hover1.png)![](/illustration/dashboard/hover2.png)![](/illustration/dashboard/hover3.png)![](/illustration/dashboard/hover4.png)![](/illustration/dashboard/hover5.png)

The secret to our unbeatable approval rates? Two words: artificial intelligence.

Our advanced AI algorithms and machine learning create and improve custom fraud rules tailored for your business, including device fingerprinting technology, proxy piercing and detection.

![](/illustration/dashboard/hover3.png)

![](/illustration/dashboard/normal.png)

![](/illustration/bullet/purple1new.svg)

Filter

You can easily filter by specific SiteNames, Chargeback Entry Date, Order Submission Date, Domestic and International, MOTO (phone orders) and Internet Orders.

![](/illustration/bullet/border2.svg)

Site Performance

Site Performance: A quick snapshot of your website’s performance, including Friendly Fraud Chargeback Data, Unique Customers Data, Repeat Customers Data and more.

![](/illustration/bullet/border3.svg)

Statuses

Snapshot view of all your orders, broken down by order statuses, including approved, declined, and fraud.

![](/illustration/bullet/border4.svg)

Totals submitted

Track your total number of orders submitted with year by year sales comparisons.

![](/illustration/bullet/border5.svg)

Declined vs Fraud

Graphical overview to help you monitor the declined orders relative to the fraud attempts.

### We use customized APIs for smooth integration with any platform, including:

![](/illustration/customerLogos/magento.svg)

![](/illustration/customerLogos/shopify.svg)

![](/illustration/customerLogos/oracle.svg)

![](/illustration/customerLogos/ibm.svg)

![](/illustration/customerLogos/chart/purpleCircle.png)

Under 1 second response time

![](/illustration/customerLogos/chart/greenCircle.png)

Up to 98% approvals

![](/illustration/customerLogos/chart/yellowCircle.svg)

100's of data points captured on every order

"We’ve never had a good order marked as fraud"

##### ![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/quotes.svg)

We used to do our fraud protection manually. It took so much time digging into the research, and there was always the guessing element, leaving us with the risk of either losing a valid sale, or facing a chargeback. 

After looking into payment processing companies who offer fraud protection as part of their services, and realising that their approval rates were too low, we signed up with FraudFix. At FraudFix, there’s always somebody to talk to, and their approvals are really fast – no more waiting a day or longer. Other companies we’ve tried took forever (or close to it!) to approve transactions. The best part with FraudFix is that if they slip up, we get paid back without any hassle. There’s no paperwork and long claim process; just an easy, convenient, no-questions-asked refund.

We’ve been with FraudFix for many years and I recommend them to colleagues all the time. It’s very low-risk, saves a lot of time for everyone in the company, and there’s an exceptionally high approval rate – we’ve never had a good order marked as fraud.

#### Moshe Schnitzer

CEO, Gemnation

[![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/logo-main-dark.svg)](/)[![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.fraudfix.com/logo-main-dark.svg)](/)

links.title: RDE Holdings
links.content:
# [RDE](index.html)

## Welcome to RDE, Inc.

Our vision is to become the world's leading online platform for dining experiences with unparalleled access to the widest selection of restaurants and the best deals. We are committed to driving innovation and expanding our services to meet the needs of both diners and restaurants.

[Read More](#about)

## Turning Gift Cards into Savings

Since 2019, CardCash has been on a mission to transform the world's $140+ billion of unused gift cards into incredible discounts for savvy shoppers. CardCash doesn't only help consumers save, but also helps brands earn a new revenue streams through the world of gift cards

[Read More](#about)

## We’re not just about deals

At RDE, Inc., we are proud to offer a diverse range of businesses that help connect consumers, businesses, and communities. Our high-value, low-cost offerings enable businesses to entice customers, increase sales, and promote customer satisfaction through our Business Incentives Program.

[Read More](#companies)

## Savings and deals that are Red Hot.

Formerly Specials by Restaurant.com, RedTag brings a vibrant array of deals, far beyond dining, into entertainment, leisure, and more. It's a dynamic deal site, building on our proven model to offer you even greater variety and value. Embrace the future with RedTag, where every deal is an opportunity to explore new experiences.

[Read More](#about)

[ ](#heroCarousel) [ ](#heroCarousel)

![RDC websites](assets/img/about/rdcsitegroup.png)

### RDE, Inc. is the parent company of innovative brands in the dining, entertainment, and retail space.

Our flagship brand, Restaurant.com, is the nation's largest restaurant-focused digital deals brand, founded in 1999. We’re also a powerful marketing program for restaurants and a trusted partner for many businesses. We're excited to share our vision with you of becoming the online destination for all things restaurant.

#### [Publicly traded]()

RDE, Inc. is a public company traded on the Nasdaq Capital Market with ticker symbol GIFT. As a diversified holding company, RDE, Inc. operates a range of businesses that connect consumers, businesses, and communities across the United States.

#### [Nationwide offerings]()

Whether you're looking for the best deals at your favorite local eatery or searching for a new dining experience across the country, we've got you covered. With thousands of dining and retail deals available nationwide, our customers can save big on every meal and shopping spree.

#### [Experienced leadership]()

Led by CEO and Chairman Ketan Thakker, our talented and experienced management team and board of directors have a deep understanding of the essential components of our e-commerce platforms, customer habits and demographics, and product sourcing.

0M+

total customers on file

0K+

monthly unique visitors

0M+

email opt-ins

0K+

restaurants and retailers

## Companies

### Our Companies

At RDE, Inc., we're constantly striving to offer our customers the best in the online deal space. By expanding our network, we continue to deliver unparalleled deals and incentives to our loyal customers, while also reaching new audiences and markets.

#### ![RDC logo](assets/img/logos/CCLogo.png)

CardCash has the world's largest inventory of discounted gift cards and since its inception, has saved customers more than $150 million from their favorite retail brands. Today, we continue our tradition of keeping an open dialog with consumers, constantly evolving new, innovative ways to get the best price. We have a strong mission of never letting anyone pay the full amount for anything by turning the world's over $140 billion of unused gift cards into major discounts.

#### ![RDC logo](assets/img/logos/RDC.png)

Our flagship brand, Restaurant.com, is the nation's largest restaurant-focused digital deals brand, founded in 1999. With over 184,000 restaurants and retailers across the country, our platform connects digital consumers, businesses, and communities by offering thousands of dining and retail deal options.

#### ![Red Tag logo](assets/img/logos/RedTag.png)

Our customers can find a variety of options and savings to enhance their dining experience with our RedTag.com division. We bundle Restaurant.com Gift Cards with other entertainment options like theater, movies, live events, attractions, and wine.

### We remain committed to creating long-term value for our shareholders

We are thrilled that you're interested in our vision to become the world's leading online platform for dining experiences! Join us on this exciting journey towards a bright future together.

[Contact Us Today](#contact)

## Team

### Our Management Team

Our success wouldn't be possible without our talented and experienced management team.

##### Ketan Thakker

CEO RDE, Inc.

##  ![Ketan Thakker](assets/img/team/Ketan.jpg)

With over 20 years of experience in finance and operations, Ketan served as CFO for Apartments. com helping the company to grow from $20M to $125M annually. He was also the founder of triprental.com prior to joining Ubid.com in 2013. He is an accredited CPA who holds an MBA from Northwestern University Kellogg School of Management.

[](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kthakker/)

##### Elliot Bohm

CEO of CardCash.com

##  ![Elliot Bohm](assets/img/team/bohm.png)

Seasoned entrepreneur with a diverse background in leveraging technology, both as an operator and a financier. Co-founded CardCash.com in 2009 and swiftly transformed the startup into one of the world's largest gift card exchange marketplaces. For his outstanding achievements, Forbes Magazine recognized Elliot as one of America's Most Promising CEOs under the age of 35, a prestigious list featuring only 22 individuals. His strategic vision has fostered key partnerships with industry giants such as Walmart, Amazon, CVS, and United Airlines, solidifying his reputation as a dynamic leader in technology-driven entrepreneurship. With a decade of experience in M&A, Elliot has successfully orchestrated investment and acquisition deals, raising over tens of millions in venture capital and debt financing from esteemed names like Guggenheim Partners, Incomm, Pathward, and Sterling National Bank.

[](https://www.linkedin.com/company/cardcash-com)

##### Mark Ackerman

COO of CardCash.com

##  ![Mark Ackerman](assets/img/team/ackerman.png)

Experienced operator, Co-founded CardCash.com in 2009, and played a pivotal role in evolving the operation from a startup with a handful of individuals into a thriving team of over 50 employees. His visionary leadership and management acumen have streamlined processes, ensuring the efficient coordination of various departments, including customer service, shipping, bulk sales, human resources, and loss prevention. With a track record of success, he continues to drive operational excellence and contribute to the growth of innovative ventures.

[](https://www.linkedin.com/company/cardcash-com)

##### Balazs Wellisch

CTO of Restaurant.com

##  ![Balazs Wellisch](assets/img/team/Balazs.jpg)

Balazs is responsible for the strategy, formulation, development and delivery of RDE's product portfolio as well as the operation of the company's IT infrastructure. As an accomplished executive, Balazs has more than 25 years of experience leading high-performing organizations and driving modern technology development and adoption for global organizations.

[](https://www.linkedin.com/in/bwellisch/)

##### Thomas Butt

CTO of CardCash.com

##  ![Thomas Butt](assets/img/team/butt.png)

Accomplished business and technology leader driven by a passion for discovering innovative approaches that yield outstanding results, Tom boasts an exceptionally diverse professional background. From his roles as a nuclear physicist and spacecraft engineer to his experiences as a software engineer, CTO, and CEO, Tom has navigated a varied and impactful career trajectory. His leadership extends across both corporate giants such as GE and Lockheed, as well as numerous startup ventures.

[](https://www.linkedin.com/company/cardcash-com)

### Our Board of Directors

With experienced leaders in finance, operations, technology, and marketing, we are committed to driving innovation and growth in all our businesses.

##### Ketan Thakker

Chairman

##  ![Ketan Thakker](assets/img/team/Ketan.jpg)

With over 20 years of experience in finance and operations, Ketan served as CFO for Apartments. com helping the company to grow from $20M to $125M annually. He was also the founder of triprental.com prior to joining Ubid.com in 2013. He is an accredited CPA who holds an MBA from Northwestern University Kellogg School of Management.

[](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kthakker/)

##### Elliot Bohm

CEO of CardCash.com

##  ![Elliot Bohm](assets/img/team/bohm.png)

Seasoned entrepreneur with a diverse background in leveraging technology, both as an operator and a financier. Co-founded CardCash.com in 2009 and swiftly transformed the startup into one of the world's largest gift card exchange marketplaces. For his outstanding achievements, Forbes Magazine recognized Elliot as one of America's Most Promising CEOs under the age of 35, a prestigious list featuring only 22 individuals. His strategic vision has fostered key partnerships with industry giants such as Walmart, Amazon, CVS, and United Airlines, solidifying his reputation as a dynamic leader in technology-driven entrepreneurship. With a decade of experience in M&A, Elliot has successfully orchestrated investment and acquisition deals, raising over tens of millions in venture capital and debt financing from esteemed names like Guggenheim Partners, Incomm, Pathward, and Sterling National Bank.

[](https://www.linkedin.com/company/cardcash-com)

##### Kevin Harrington

Board Member

##  ![Kevin Harrington](assets/img/team/Kevin.png)

Nearly 40 years experience in product introduction and direct marketing, being one of the first to market products through infomercials in 1984. A serial entrepreneur, Mr. Harrington appeared as one of the original panelists on “Shark Tank,” from 2009 to 2011. He currently serves as a director of Celsius Corp., Emergent Health Corp., and Redwood Scientific Technologies, Inc.

[](https://www.linkedin.com/in/thekevinharrington/)

##### Paul Danner

Board Member

##  ![Paul Danner](assets/img/team/Paul.png)

As the Chief Executive of Pepex Biomedical, Inc., Mr. Danner has established a prosperous track record while leading business development efforts and effectuating B2C, B2B & B2G business transactions on five continents, and leading three Nasdaq-listed companies as the senior corporate executive building over $1 Billion in shareholder value. He previously served as a Naval Aviator flying the F-14 Tomcat.

[](https://www.linkedin.com/in/pauldanner/)

##### Scott Wingo

Board Member

##  ![Scott Wingo](assets/img/team/Scott.png)

Mr. Wingo is a co-founder and former Executive Chairman of the board of ChannelAdvisor and served as general manager of GoTo Auctions, CEO and co-founder of AuctionRover.com, which was acquired by GoTo.com, and as CEO and co-founder of Stingray Software, which was acquired by RogueWave.

[](https://www.linkedin.com/in/thescotwingo/)

## Contact

### Get In Touch With Us

Thank you for your interest in RDE, Inc. If you have any questions, comments, or concerns, please feel free to contact us using the information below.

Restaurant.com Support | [CardCash Support](https://www.cardcash.com/contact/) | RedTag Support

#### Address

1100 E Woodfield Road Suite 510 Schaumburg, IL 60173 

#### General Inquiries

(847) 506-9680info@rdeholdings.com

#### Investor Relations

(847) 506-9680investors@rdeholdings.com

#### Media Inquiries

(847) 506-9680media@rdeholdings.com

Your name

Your email address

Your message

Send Message

### Thank you

Your message was sent!

Send another message

links.title: Investors
links.content:
# [RDE](index.html)

# Investor Relations

## Investors

### We are thrilled that you're interested in joining us as we look towards a bright future together!

As the restaurant industry continues to evolve and present new opportunities for growth, we are poised and ready to capitalize on them. Our innovative business and partnership models have proven stable and relevant, and we are excited to continue expanding our presence in the online marketplace. With a focus on strategic investments, operational excellence, and disciplined financial management, we believe our future is full of exciting opportunities for growth and success.

[ ![Kevin Harrington from ABC's Shark Tank](assets/img/investors/Kevin.png) ](https://www.youtube.com/embed/iO-T8i_w5DQ)

##### Our Vision

At RDE, Inc., our vision is to become the world's leading online platform for dining experiences. We will offer unparalleled access to the widest selection of restaurants and the best deals while innovating and expanding our services to meet the needs of both diners and restaurants. We believe our future is full of opportunity in the online and mobile space. As customers continue to seek dining and retail deals, we will continue to expand our customer base, while also striving to become the online destination for "all things restaurant".

##### Our Experience

With a unique blend of leadership skills and capabilities, our management team has a history of success across the marketing, e-commerce, and dining sectors, strategically building consumer loyalty and brand equity. As one of the most experienced teams in online commerce, we have a deep knowledge of the essential components of our e-commerce platforms, customer habits and demographics, and product sourcing, providing a stable foundation for all of our future efforts.

##### Our Plan

Our objective is to leverage our e-commerce expertise with the Restaurant.com technology, platform, familiar website domain name, and customer base to increase our B2B and B2C business, as well as to increase revenues through accretive acquisitions. The key elements of our growth strategy include increasing the number of restaurants on our program, increasing the number of product offerings, expanding our B2B client base, and pursuing acquisitions to deepen our involvement with restaurants and expand in the entertainment industry.

######  Increasing restaurant numbers 

######  Increasing product offerings 

######  Expanding our B2B client base 

######  Pursuing acquisitions 

######  Deepen our involvement with restaurants 

######  Expand in the entertainment industry 

### Our goal is to make every dining experience memorable and create lasting value for all.

As we continue to pursue our growth initiatives, we remain committed to creating long-term value for our shareholders through strategic investments, operational excellence, and disciplined financial management.

## Stock

### Ticker GIFT

For up-to-date stock information, please visit our ticker symbol [on the Nasdaq Capital Market](https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/stocks/gift). Additionally, our quarterly and annual financial reports are available on the [SEC website](https://www.sec.gov/edgar/browse/?CIK=1760233&owner=exclude).

[](https://www.tradingview.com/symbols/GIFT/?utm_source=www.rdeholdings.com&utm_medium=widget_new&utm_campaign=chart&utm_term=GIFT)

## F.A.Q.

### Frequently Asked Questions

We're committed to transparency and openness with our shareholders and stakeholders, and we look forward to hearing from you. If you have any additional questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our investor relations team using the contact information provided.

##  When was the company founded? 

Restaurant.com was founded in 1999. 

##  When did RDE, Inc. go public?

RDE, Inc. went public in 2019.

##  What is RDE, Inc.'s stock symbol?

RDE, Inc.'s stock symbol is GIFT.

##  Where is RDE, Inc. stock traded?

RDE, Inc.'s stock is traded on the Nasdaq Capital Market.

##  How do I contact RDE, Inc.'s investor relations?

You can contact RDE, Inc.'s investor relations team by visiting the [contact us](index.html#contact) section of our website.

##  How many employees does RDE, Inc. have?

As of our most recent filing, we had approximately 50 employees.

##  Who is RDE, Inc.'s transfer agent?

Our transfer agent is Transhare.com.

##  How do I change the address on my shareholder account?

To change the address on your shareholder account, please contact our transfer agent, Transhare.com.

##  When does RDE, Inc.'s fiscal year end?

Our fiscal year ends on December 31st.

##  Who are RDE, Inc.'s independent auditors?

Our independent auditors are Weinberg & Co. Accounting Firm.

##  Who is RDE, Inc.'s outside SEC counsel?

Our outside SEC counsel is Culhane Medows PLLC.

##  Can I buy stock directly from RDE, Inc.?

No, RDE, Inc. does not offer a direct stock purchase program. Please contact your preferred brokerage firm to purchase shares of RDE, Inc.

[](#)
